column4: i use linux for everyday use surfin the web downloading torrents etc i only really use windows when connecting my laptop to xbox to play online
i use ushare it works well. basically just install start and then do a netstat or something to see what port it bound to and open browser to that url
dont u have to mess around with iptables and such to get the xbox up and runnin
id recommend maybe a box like popcorn hour though if you want more serious streaming especially hd
